title: MMXII (2017)
overview: Fearing for his comatose girlfriend's life, Patrick creates a way to enter her world to bring her back to reality.
storyline: MMXII is the story of a young man named Patrick who's love of his life, Brie, fell into a coma one year ago. To everyone around him, she is already lost due to the severity of her condition. Fearing for her life and desperate to hold on to her, Patrick creates a way to enter into her world to bring her back to reality. In Brie's comatose world, she believes Patrick is missing and has been for a year until she receives a mysterious package from him telling her he is still alive and waiting for her in a far away location. He instructs her to follow the poems she wrote to him a year ago as a map to this magical place. On Brie's way there, Patrick meets up with her to lead her the rest of the way safely. However, when Patrick's mission to bring her home causes Brie's mind to fight back, he must race against the clock in order to save her.
synopsis: MMXII is the story of a young man named Patrick whos love of his life, Brie, fell into a coma one year ago. Fearing for her life, Patrick creates a way to enter into her world to bring her back to reality. But when her mind begins to fight back, he must race against the clock to bring her home.
